channel.title: How do I make a full shop?
channel.description:
Okay, im running pi and I want to make a random npc that sells items. I don't mean one that has an option to trade. Just some npc of my choice.
For example:
[code]28 - Zoo keeper - Enjoys locking up animals in small pens. [/code]
Take the talk command and make it a trade command. Then how do I add items to it and make it a shop?

item.title: How do I make a full shop?
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:


This is an example of how to make a shop with items.

I'll explain it a little bit.
shop = 1 // the id of the shop you will be using.
General_store //The name of the shop
1         1 // Is the shop able to buy other items than it sells? 1   1 no , 2    2 yes (like general store should be  2       2)
1000     5 // 1000 is item id, 5 is item amount. remember to use tabs.

[b]Data>cfg>shops[/b]

Then src>model>player>packets>clickNPC

Search for first_click.

Add there something like
[code=java]if(npcID == 28){
OpenUpShop = 1;
}[/code]
Note: The above code won't work. I don't code pi servers so i don't know how it's handled there.

This is an example of how to make a shop with items.

I’ll explain it a little bit.
shop = 1 // the id of the shop you will be using.
General_store //The name of the shop
1 1 // Is the shop able to buy other items than it sells? 1 1 no , 2 2 yes (like general store should be 2 2)
1000 5 // 1000 is item id, 5 is item amount. remember to use tabs.

Data>cfg>shops

Then src>model>player>packets>clickNPC

Search for first_click.

Add there something like

if(npcID == 28){ OpenUpShop = 1; }
Note: The above code won’t work. I don’t code pi servers so i don’t know how it’s handled there.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a full shop?
